attributes.additional_details: Increase pensioners personnel allowance to £15,500 which would allow them to receive the equivalent of £7.45ph for 40hrs for 52wks. Which is classed as a living wage and stop them having to pay tax on money they have been paying it on for the last 40yrs. Why should anyone currently receiving in pensions more than £10,500 have to pay tax on, in many cases a few thousand more? Have you not had enough out of us?
